Waypoint.action:
--## SCRIPT CONFIG ##--
----BP---- MainBP = "beach backpack" LootBP = "purple backpack" MiscBPID = 2869 --- blue backpack (food, rope, shovel etc.) LootBPID = 2868 --- purple backpack
---HUNT---- FLOOR = "-1" --- ("-1" or "-2" or "Both") CapToLeave = 250 MPToLeave = 300 HPToLeave = 20
---POTIONS---- MPId = 237 --- strong mana potion MPToBuy = 1700 HPId = 23375 --- supreme health potion HPToBuy = 100
Waypoint.label: CFG

Waypoint.action:
--## DEPOSITER ##--
local mainBpItem = getinventory(INVENTORY_BACKPACK) wait(500) reopenbps({mainBpItem.id, "back"}, {LootBPID, MainBP, true}) wait(1000) opendepot("depot") wait(200,500) deposititems(LootBP, 1, 2) wait(200,500) closecontainers() wait(200,500) reopenbps({mainBpItem.id, "back"}, { LootBPID, MainBP, true}, { MiscBPID, MainBP, true})
Waypoint.label: DEPOSITER

Waypoint.action:
--## BANK ##--
talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "deposit all") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes")
Waypoint.label: BANK

Waypoint.action:
--## MANA SHOP ##--
talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "trade") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "potions") wait(200,500) sellobject(285,countitems(285)) wait(200,500) sellobject(284,countitems(284)) wait(200,500) sellobject(283,countitems(283)) wait(200,500) buyitemsupto(MPId, MPToBuy) wait(200,500) buyitemsupto(HPId, HPToBuy)
Waypoint.label: MANASHOP

Waypoint.action:
--## SUPPLY CHECK ##--
if (countitems(MPId) < MPToLeave) or (countitems(HPId) < HPToLeave) or (cap() < CapToLeave) then gotolabel("START") else gotolabel("GOHUNT") end
Waypoint.label: CHECK

Waypoint.action:
--## TO VENORE ##--
reachnpc("Captain Sinbeard") wait(500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "venore") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes") waitping()
Waypoint.label: TOVENORE

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK ##--
if not islocation(0) then gotolabel("#016") end

--## OPEN DOOR ##--
local position = Position:new(posx(), posy()-1, posz()) usedoor(position, "open")
Waypoint.label: OPEN1

Waypoint.action:
--## OPEN DOOR2 ##--
local position = Position:new(posx()-1, posy(), posz()) usedoor(position, "open") move("w")
Waypoint.label: OPEN2

Waypoint.action:
--## TO RASCACOON ##--
reachnpc("Eustacio") wait(500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "shortcut") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes") waitping()
Waypoint.label: TRAVEL

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK2 ##--
if not islocation() then gotolabel("#024") end

--## LOC CHECK3 ##--
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#029") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck3

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK4 ##--
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#032") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck4

Waypoint.action:
--## TO BOAT ##--
reachnpc("Captain Jack Rat") wait(500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "sail") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "safe") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes") waitping()
Waypoint.label: Travel

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK5 ##--
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("Travel") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck5

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK6 ##--
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#038") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck6

Waypoint.action:
--## FLOOR CHECK ##--
if FLOOR == "-2" then gotolabel("GoDown") end

--## SUPP&FLOOR CHECK ##--
if FLOOR == "-1" then if (countitems(MPId) < MPToLeave) or (countitems(HPId) < HPToLeave) or (cap() < CapToLeave) then gotolabel("LeaveStart") else gotolabel("#044") end else if (countitems(MPId) < MPToLeave) or (countitems(HPId) < HPToLeave) or (cap() < CapToLeave) then gotolabel("LeaveStart") else gotolabel("GoDown") end end
Waypoint.label: CheckSupp

Waypoint.action:
--## GO DOWN ##--
levitate("w", "down")
Waypoint.label: ExaniHurDown

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK7 ##--
if not islocation() then gotolabel("GoDown") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck123

Waypoint.action:
--## SUPP&FLOOR CHECK2 ##--
if FLOOR == "-2" then if (countitems(MPId) < MPToLeave) or (countitems(HPId) < HPToLeave) or (cap() < CapToLeave) then levitate("e", "up") else gotolabel("#068") end else levitate("e", "up") end
Waypoint.label: ExaniHurUp

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC&SUPP CHECK ##--
if not islocation() then gotolabel("GoUp") end if (countitems(MPId) < MPToLeave) or (countitems(HPId) < HPToLeave) or (cap() < CapToLeave) then gotolabel("LeaveStart") else gotolabel("StartHunt") end
Waypoint.label: Check123

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK8 ##--
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("LeaveStart") end
Waypoint.label: LocCheck

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK9 ##--
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("USE") end

--## OPEN DOOR3 ##--
local position = Position:new(posx()+1, posy(), posz()) usedoor(position, "open") move("e")
Waypoint.label: OPEN3

Waypoint.action:
--## OPEN DOOR4 ##--
local position = Position:new(posx(), posy()+1, posz()) usedoor(position, "open")
Waypoint.label: OPEN4

Waypoint.action:
--## TO ANKRAHMUN ##--
reachnpc("Captain Fearless") wait(500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, "hi") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "ankrahmun") wait(200,500) talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_NPC_TO, "yes") waitping()
Waypoint.label: TOANKRAHMUN

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC CHECK9 ##--
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("#070") end

Script.content: auto(18000, 60000) local position = getitempositionfromcontainers(3725) useobject(position, 3725, position.z, 0)

auto(1000) local creatures = getcreatures() for _, c in ipairs(creatures) do if c.type == CREATURE_TYPE_MONSTER and c.dist <= 7 and (c.name == "pirat bombardier" or c.name == "pirat scoundrel") and not cooldown(237) and mp() > 100 then if cooldown(237) then wait(2000) end talk(1, "Exeta Amp Res") break end end
auto(1000,2500) if maround(3) < 1 and cancast("utani tempo hur") and not ishasted() and not ispzone() then cast("utani tempo hur") end

function dropflask() for i=283, 285 do local flaskCount = countitems(i) if flaskCount > 0 then dropitems(i, flaskCount) end end end
auto(7000,12000) if cap() <= 500 then dropflask() end

TargetRule.Name: Pirat Bombardier, Pirat Scoundrel, Pirat Mate, Pirat Cutthroat
